channel.title: Projects on Eamonn Cottrell
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Eamonn Cottrell

item.title: Re-cover
item.description: This is meant to address the more common web needs of a group. Namely, a clean, readable and easily accessible site for any member to: Find basic information about the meeting. i.e. location, times, format. Access the meeting guide and participate without the need for paper handouts. Access any online only meeting resources. Contribute donations to the group easily online.

item.title: Pinhoti
item.description: A race site for the Pinhoti 100 mile footrace. This is a concept site I made for an existing race in need of a makeover. I used Stackbit with Hugo & Forestry for this and deployed it on Netlify.
